title: PRIVACY_ACT_COLLECTION_RETENTION_AND_DISPOSAL_OF_PERSONAL_INFORMATION
all_text: Personal InformationInformation about another individual 26 The head of a government institution may refuse todisclose any personal information requested under subsection 12(1) about an individual other than the individual who made the request, and shall refuse to disclosesuch information where the disclosure is prohibited under section 8. 1980-81-82-83, c. 111, Sch. II “26”.
